channel.title: Need help on clickitem.java

item.title: Need help on clickitem.java
item.dc:creator: @vithushan1000 vithushan1000
item.description:
@vithushan1000 wrote:

plz help
i have this : bit of it
//Begin artifacts by Hirukos
if (itemId >= 14876 && itemId <= 14892) {
int a = itemId;
String YEYAF = "<col=1532693>You Exchanged Your Artifact For ";
if (a == 14876){
c.getItems().deleteItem(a,1);
c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);
c.sendMessage(YEYAF + “<col=1532693>10 million Coins!”);
}
this dont work when i click on the item artifact it does not turn in to money…please help peeps…

Read full topic
